trends: There have been no other sightings in Bretleben
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter (10) told me if she's standing on the living room window there is something in the air. I asked her if it is a Airplane or Helicopter or Ballon , she said no, nothing, something others. I searched for myself this object through the window and found out she's right. I call my wife and she came and saw the same object. We opened the window and looked through a telescope and then I took the camera and did some photos. The object looks like a probe and we all have never seen such a object in the sky before. The object rotate slowly and has sometimes a butterfly look. It looks like not made on earth so to speak. We run on the highest floor in our house to see more, we could see this object around 5 minute and we lost it in the landscape.
